name: A Street Cat's Tale 2
description:
Little did Cinnamon know...that the streets were a concrete jungle...!!



A Street Cat's Tale 2
follows Cinnamon, who wanders out the window in pursuit of a butterfly.
It is a Sokoban-based, narrative-led puzzle adventure game about the struggles of stray cats.

In search of new locations



Cinnamon wakes up in a place he has never seen before, oblivious to what lies ahead of him...
Will his wandering ever end?
Will he find his owner?
Solve the puzzles in Cinnnamon's way as you advance into new locations.

Fighting Hunger



Cinnamon is very busy and very hungry.
Garbage bins offer temporary relief but never quality food.
Venture around the neighborhood, hunt for mice, frogs and other prey.

Everyone has a story



Explore the neighborhood, meet new characters and talk to them.
They will tell you more about themselves when provided with the right gifts.
Many adorable animals await you with their own little stories.



Will Cinnamon make it home safely?
Play to find out!
